testimonials.author: John Doe
testimonials.name: A masterpiece of literature
testimonials.reviewBody: I really enjoyed this book. It captures the essential challenge people face as they try make sense of their lives and grow to adulthood.

testimonials.author: Bob Smith
testimonials.name: A good read.
testimonials.reviewBody: Catcher in the Rye is a fun book. It's a good book to read.

testimonials.author: Duderino
testimonials.name: This is just my opinion, man
testimonials.reviewBody: I felt so taken care of, I finished my beverage, man.
